2067680.name: REmatch
2067680.description:
REmatch is an RPG game with a spooky, chess puzzle, and variety of combat systems. You are stuck in this unknown city, but you have to face all the challenging events to go home. You are not the best, you are not the worst, you are a chess champion who creates solutions for all. Grab weapons, solve puzzles, explore, and overcome the darkness.

Features

  • Story Driven Single Player:

Nashed became a chess champion, but he suddenly teleported an unknown city where Zaman Blames him for the murder crime. Help Nashed overcome this unfairness.



  • Chess Puzzles:

Anyone who never played chess can also solve these puzzles. Objectives shows exactly what player needs to solve. Player just have think and pick the best option.



  • Varity of Combat Systems, Enemies, and Weapons:

There are different types of combat system, enemies, and weapons to ensure that the player is constantly experiencing new game mechanics throughout the gameplay and prevent repetition.



For the combat system, there are melee combat system with sword, double sword, and scythe, and range weapon system with pistol, assault rifles, flamethrower, and more.

  • Chess Power Items:

In the dark side of the city, chess loving scientist created supernatural drugs that gives specific power based on each chess pieces. Here’s a list:


  • Pawn: Healing

  • Knight: quick movement

  • Bishop: Stuns enemies

  • Rook: Cannon

  • Queen: Teleport

  • King: Cover Wall



  • Skill Tree:

In the skill tree interface, you can upgrade or unlock new abilities for your weapons, shield, or chess pieces with crowns (upgrade points) which you can get by leveling up.
For example, if you upgrade the knight chess piece, you can unlock super jump.
Another example, if you upgrade your shield, it can take more damage.



Note: Upgrading is not necessary, you can finish the game without upgrading at all.
